text: Jean-Pierre Bellet (born 5 June 1932) is a French rower. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome with the men's eight where they came fourth. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:Living people Category:French male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of France Category:Rowers at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Paris Category:World Rowing Championships medalists for France Category:European Rowing Championships medalists
title: Jean-Pierre Bellet
